# r6_Questionnaire

A questionnaire is created a list of one or multiple [XlsForm](http://xlsform.org)

Functions to 

 * filter content based on a selection of: "indicator - population - disaggregation" - selection
 * generate xlsform file
 * get priority for indicator
 * calculate duration
 * Configure survey details, such as introductory and closing remarks and time limit.
 * Select recipients for the survey.
 * Publish the survey to the selected users or groups.
